blogPost.excerpt: 176 Customizable Figma Templates special for Product Hunt, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and IndieHackers. Increase your engagement, celebrate the main event of the year together with your audience. Merry Christmas!
blogPost.body: 176 Customizable Figma Templates special for Product Hunt, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and IndieHackers. Increase your engagement, celebrate the main event of the year together with your audience. Merry Christmas!
blogPost.title: Christmas Design Kit - 176 Figma Design Templates for startups
blogPost.author: Oleksandr Nedobitkov

localize.description: 176个可定制的Figma模板，专门用于Product Hunt、Twitter、Facebook、Instagram和IndieHacker。增加你的参与度，和你的观众一起庆祝一年中的主要活动。圣诞快乐！
176個可定製的Figma模板，專門用於Product Hunt、Twitter、Facebook、Instagram和IndieHacker。增加你的參與度，和你的觀衆一起慶祝一年中的主要活動。聖誕快樂！

previous.excerpt: Discover 16 free objects created with Cinema 4D. Virtual reality tools and other gadgets are embodied in volumetric graphics. Customize any object in Cinema 4D to get your perfect one. All elements are fully editable.
previous.title: Free 3D Slam Illustrations - Virtual reality gadgets are embodied in volumetric graphics

localize.description: 探索使用Cinema 4D创建的16个免费对象。虚拟现实工具和其他小工具体现在体积图形中。自定义影院4D中的任何对象以获得完美的对象。所有图元都是完全可编辑的。
localize.tagline: 虚拟现实小工具体现在体积图形中

localize.description: 探索使用Cinema 4D創建的16個免費對象。虛擬現實工具和其他小工具體現在體積圖形中。自定義影院4D中的任何對象以獲得完美的對象。所有圖元都是完全可編輯的。
localize.tagline: 虛擬現實小工具體現在體積圖形中

next.excerpt: Timestripe is a productivity app with multiple planning layouts and tools to manage goals, build powerful habits and organize your life. Here is a demo https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b6DsADKrGnk https://youtu.be/EtJ6sDMCylo (4 minutes)
next.title: Timestripe - Goal-oriented planner

localize.description: Timestrike是一款生产力应用程序，拥有多种计划布局和工具，可以管理目标、养成强大的习惯并组织你的生活。这是一个演示https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b6DsADKrGnk https://youtu.be/EtJ6sDMCylo(4分钟)
localize.tagline: 以目标为导向的规划者

localize.description: Timestrike是一款生產力應用程序，擁有多種計劃佈局和工具，可以管理目標、養成強大的習慣並組織你的生活。這是一個演示https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b6DsADKrGnk https://youtu.be/EtJ6sDMCylo(4分鐘)
localize.tagline: 以目標爲導向的規劃者
